First Name Claudia Last Name Hiersche Birthday 22nd February, 1977 Birthplace Frankfurt an der Oder, Brandenburg, Germany Height 5' 7" (170 cm) Build Slim Eye Color Grey Hair Color Blonde Zodiac Sign Pisces Sexuality Straight Ethnicity White Nationality German Occupation Text Actress, Model, Host Occupation Actress Claim to Fame her role as Carla von Lahnstein in the Das Erste soap opera Verbotene Liebe and its spin-off series Verbotene Liebe - Next Generation Year(s) Active 2010 - present Official Websites http://claudiahiersche.de

Claudia Hiersche (born 22 February 1977 in Frankfurt (Oder), German Democratic Republic (now Federal Republic of Germany)) is a German host and actress and is well known for her portrayal of the lesbian fictional character Carla von Lahnstein in the soap opera Verbotene Liebe (Forbidden Love), where she was on contract status between 2003 and 2009.
